website_summaries.verdict: A shampoo that nourishes color-treated hair gently.
pros: Packed with natural proteins to make hair strong yet soft
Protects color treated hair from harsh UV rays
cons: It should have a smoother consistency to avoid being harsh

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: This is a genuine product. It came wrapped up and didn’t have any thing to make it look like it’s temper with. I use it everyday for my ashy blonde and my hair color is holding. It’s not turning brassy orange yet (only on some very small areas). The smell of shampoo is very pleasant. Great shampoo
customer_reviews.author: H. Koyama

customer_reviews.title: I really like this shampoo a lot
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shampoo a lot. I used Paul Mitchell for years, but the formula seems to have changed and no longers "suds up" as much. So I switched over to Redken, and I like it a lot better. Good price, too.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Annual gift to sister, this is her #1 choice ...
customer_reviews.text: Annual gift to sister, this is her #1 choice and always asks for this to be at least one of her gifts, doesn't strip color from her hair and leaves it soft and shiney
customer_reviews.author: Teresa A Dotson

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Shiny Color Remains Longer
customer_reviews.text: Love this seller! Packaging was super-awesome and protective of the product. Exceptional deal on the product that I have used off and on for years. Really helps hold the color and maintain the hue. Hair is soft after washing even with hair like mine with coloring every 4 months. Love Redkin!
customer_reviews.author: memphisrain

customer_reviews.title: Great salon product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I love Redkin products. We have this product in our salon but the small bottles are so expensive. This large size is cheaper than the small ones. This product lasts a really long time so I don't have to order it very often.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo for color-treated hair!
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo for color treated hair! Produces a nice lather, and was recommended by a hairstylist who uses it for her color-treated hair. Purchased this product online because of the great price!
customer_reviews.author: myrtle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shampoo for Color Treated Hair
customer_reviews.text: I have ised this shampoo for years, i have curly, color treated hair and it works beautifully. My husbnd who doesn't color his hair also likes it as it has a nice, clean smell and cleans hair well and leaves it feeling nice.
customer_reviews.author: TheKitchenGoddess

customer_reviews.title: Credibility of Seller is Important
customer_reviews.text: We are always cautioned not to purchase certain brand names from third party sellers....was very pleased that this Seller and product are 100% legit. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I like this shampoo very much. It works great with my well water that is acidic but has been conditioned with lots of salts. I use it on highlighted hair but cannot determine that is preserves/extends the color. I just like the way my hair manages when I use it. It's a bargain in the 33.8 oz size, but now feel like I may have just bought a lifetime supply. Not a problem. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Gramma

customer_reviews.title: Locks hair color in
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shampoo ever. I have been color treating my red-brunette hair for a long time now, and this is by far my favorite shampoo for this. It just maintains the color, it doesn't dye it make it more red etc, It just locks in your current hair color for a long time
customer_reviews.author: AryBeats

customer_reviews.title: Superior Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shampoo for color treated hair. Have tried others but always return to Redken due to its constant superiority ABOVE ALL OTHERS!!!

customer_reviews.title: Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This is the shampoo my hair dresser uses and always like the smell and it is cheaper then my normal shampoo. However for some reason it would not soap up and it does not have that nice scent. I'm not sure why but back to my chouce of shampoo.

customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo for protecting hair color and conditioning at the same time. Great value for the price. Will purchase again.

customer_reviews.text: This was a complete scam. It's not actual redkin and I can tell from the texture of the shampoo and the scent. I'm pretty disappointed. I would NOT purchase again so beware!

customer_reviews.title: Horrible shampoo. Totally hate it.
customer_reviews.text: I guess it went on sale for a reason... It was the biggest mistake buying it. As soon as I opened it, it smelled so strong like a bathroom cleaning product. On top of that, this shampoo is like a conditioner texture. It barely gives you any lather as you wash your hair. It is heavy on the hair leaving you greasy and like you have vaseline stuck on the hair with a terrible scent left on your hair. I would never buy this product ever again. I am going back to redken frizz shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Hi

customer_reviews.title: Get Real
customer_reviews.text: OMG I'm rating the best product in the world. Come on really WTF why are you asking me to rate a product? There is no happiness in things. There is only happiness in helping others.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, bad seller
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite shampoo for color treated hair. However, when I ordered it using Prime it said the shampoo would arrive in the standard two or three days. Instead it took over a week. The bottle looked a little banged up so I checked the batch code and it was manufactured in October 2018. So it’s a year old, and the bottle says it has a shelf life of 12 months. But it elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: MCR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shampoo - Best I've Used
customer_reviews.text: I'd heard about this shampoo as it was recommended by a hair salon. Bought it there, it was pricey but I liked it alot because it lathers so well and is good to color-treated hair. It seems to be a really good product as it leaves my hair soft and I'd say bright.This is the best shampoo I've ever run across - it's not full of needless scents and isn't a gimmick formula. Was very happy to see Amazon offers it at such a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: M. White

customer_reviews.title: It is truly the quality of less than the worse shampoo I have ever tried
customer_reviews.text: 😜 .......You might think redken would be Redken. But not in this case. It is truly the quality of less than the worse shampoo I have ever tried. It cannot be true Redken as I have ever known of Redken. 🤦‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Dogs r my fave

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT SHAMPOO
customer_reviews.text: So nice to get this delivered rather than going to the Mall to get it. Well balanced shampoo especially for hair that has been dyed. Has great conditioning but not overly heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne V

customer_reviews.title: Works for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: My hairdresser recommended this for my colored hair, but said it was a great shampoo for my whole family. It isn't a strong scent, and it is pleasant. I have long thin hair, and I don't need to use a conditioner with this. This was a re-purchase. My family will be using this shampoo for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Scorpica

customer_reviews.title: More bang (volume) for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Buying in bulk (large/giant size) certainly saves money, especially when compared to the smaller size in supermarkets. Same product, just the big size, and really big savings!

My hair feels amazing, it has helped the health of my scalp, and smells like I just walked out of the salon. Love it!

product_meta.title: Redken Color Extend Shampoo, Hair Color Protecting Shampoo For Color-Treated Hair, 33.799999999999997 fl. oz.
product_meta.description: Redken Color Extend Shampoo for color-treated hair gently cleanses and protects to leave hair manageable, refreshed, and shiny. This color protecting shampoo improves hair strength to prevent against breakage and protects hair color from fading. This professional shampoo features Redken's exclusive Interbond Conditioning System and Fade Resist Complex with powerful micro-net technology and UV filters to help lock in hair color for hair color that looks vibrant and radiant with mirror-like shine. This shampoo formula helps protect hair color intensity by fighting the four causes of hair color change: environmental aggressors, poor cuticle condition, color altering minerals, and water.
